name: Human
origin: From Sarlona, into the Lhazaar Principalities, Khorvaire.
summary: Humans make up the majority of Khorvaire and are extremely diverse
characteristics: Humans are innovative, adaptable, and aggressive, always pushing their limits and pursuing new ideas.
prompts: Among longer-living races, what drives you, a human with limited time in life?
Are you a part of a Dragonmarked House? Or do you just have a Mark?
What was your role and opinion in the Last War?
